items.title: Cancel Jim Halpert
items.summary: Jim Halpert is not the good guy. Jim Halpert is an antagonist. He treats everyone like they aren't at his level. He destroyed a long standing relationship. He tormented his employees. This blog will lay it all out on the line.
items.content_html:
Jim Halpert is not the good guy.  Jim Halpert is an antagonist.  He treats everyone like they aren't at his level.  He destroyed a long standing relationship.  He tormented his employees.  

This blog will lay it all out on the line.
